title: Savoury cashew cream cheese

ingredients.content: 20 g fresh chives (approx. 5 tablespoons), cut into thin slices

preparations.content: Place a bowl onto mixing bowl lid and weigh cashews into it. Add salt, cover with water and set aside to soak for 3-6 hours.
Using simmering basket, drain and rinse cashews.
Place garlic and drained cashews into mixing bowl and blend <b>10 sec/speed 7<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add water, lemon juice, nutritional yeast, vinegar, pepper and salt, then blend <b>10 sec/speed 9<b>.
Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and blend <b>10 sec/speed 10<b> or until smooth.
Add chives and mix <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>. Transfer into a sterilised sealable jar and place into refrigerator until ready to use (see Tips).

hintsAndTricks: If you don't have time to soak/activate your cashews, soak nuts in boiling water for 30 minutes, then drain and use as directed.

With a cheesy, umami flavour, nutritional yeast contains all nine essential amino acids, is a great source of B vitamins and is often fortified with vitamin B12 (important for those following a vegan diet). You can find nutritional yeast at health food stores or online.
Add herbs and spices of choice for additional flavour.
You can store this cheese in the refrigerator for up to 3 days.
